title: 3 Reasons to Buy a Dashboard Camera for Your Car---and 4 Reasons Not To
description: More Americans are installing security cameras in their vehicles to prove their innocence in case of accidents or thwart intruders. But it’s hardly a no-brainer decision.

title: I Tried to Melt a Bunch of Smartphones to Find Out How You Can Save Your Battery
description: Heat is killing your battery. Our columnist provides some tips on how to protect your iPhone or Galaxy S.
